summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 77th Street (North Side), from 22nd Avenue Northwest to 23rd Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12800 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
